title: The Blue Hour in Rome (Premium)
description:
This is a preview episode. Get the full episode, and many more, ad free, on our supporter's feed: https://getsleepy.com/support.


The Blue Hour in Rome
Tonight, we say Buonasera to the beautiful Italian capital of Rome. As the evening sky transitions overhead, we'll explore the sights, sounds and fragrant scents of the streets and piazzas, during the most tranquil hour of the day. ğŸ˜´Â 
Sound design: water fountain, cafe ambience.Â

itunes:title: The Blue Hour in Rome (Premium)
itunes:author: Slumber Studios
itunes:subtitle: Narrated by Thomas Jones. Take a relaxing walk through the old streets of the Eternal City at dusk.
